pullrequest.title: Use internal urdf when we can't find it externally.

content.raw:
Yes, apologies, that is my fault.  This is the fix.

I'd be happy to use message() instead; Steven, what do you think?

And to answer your direct question, ideally we will eventually remove the built-in copy.  At that time, you'll have to use the external version.  However, that is a while away, so at this time, it is fine to let it pick the built-in one for you.
content.html:
Yes, apologies, that is my fault. This is the fix.

I'd be happy to use message() instead; Steven, what do you think?

And to answer your direct question, ideally we will eventually remove the built-in copy. At that time, you'll have to use the external version. However, that is a while away, so at this time, it is fine to let it pick the built-in one for you.
